channel.title: Ipv6 on Skycoin Project Material
channel.description: Recent content in Ipv6 on Skycoin Project Material

item.title: Development Update #30 - July 10, 2014
item.description: Summary: IPv6 support is working. We were having trouble before. Many of the residential routers appear as IPv4 but actually have IPv6 public IP addresses and are IPv4 NATs. Configuring the IPv4 DNS settings on the local host does not override the IPv6 DNS server the router is using during 4to6 translation. We have no idea what is happening. We are not sure if IPv4 and IPv6 hosts are able to operate on the same DHT network.
